name: Harvest Moon 3 GBC (2000)
description: Harvest Moon 3 GBC (Japanese: 牧場物語GB3, Hepburn: Bokujō Monogatari GB3) is a farm simulation video game for the Game Boy Color developed by Victor Interactive Software, part of the long-running Story of Seasons series of video games. Harvest Moon 3 GBC is the last game for the Game Boy Color in the series, and also one of the most distinctive. Its original Japanese release was on two separate cartridges (one for the Boy side and one for the Girl side), but was combined into one single cartridge for overseas release.
